lead_paragraph: Coaches in the N.F.L. love to break the season into segments, the better to manage a schedule that begins with hot summer practices and ends, if all goes well, with playoff games in the dead of winter.
snippet: Coaches in the N.F.L. love to break the season into segments, the better to manage a schedule that begins with hot summer practices and ends, if all goes well, with playoff games in the dead of winter.
